CIS 1.18.description: Ensure IAM policies are attached only to groups or roles
CIS 1.18.recommendation: Avoid attaching policies directly to IAM users. Use roles or groups.

CIS 1.20.description: Ensure IAM policies grant least privilege
CIS 1.20.recommendation: Review and restrict overly permissive policies using IAM Access Analyzer.

CIS 2.1.1.description: Ensure S3 buckets are not publicly accessible
CIS 2.1.1.recommendation: Enable block public access settings on all S3 buckets.
